Title: Relates to disorderly conduct
Summary: Modifies the definition of disorderly conduct for family offense proceedings to not require an intent to cause public inconvenience, annoyance or alarm, or recklessly creating a risk thereof, but merely an intent to cause annoyance or alarm, or recklessly creating a risk thereof.
LawCode: Amd §812, Fam Ct Act; amd §530.11, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act and the criminal procedure law, in relation to disorderly conduct
